about_the_game:
About This Game

Rogue Texter is a fast-paced, word-typing action game that challenges your reflexes, precision, and strategic thinking. As words descend rapidly on the screen, your goal is to type each word accurately to destroy the enemy and reduce their health. Each enemy presents new challenges, and the faster and more precise you are, the better your chances of survival.

After every successful battle, you’ll visit the shop where you can purchase powerful upgrades and abilities to help you conquer your enemies. From the Freeze power-up, which halts all incoming words for 3 seconds, to the Push ability that pushes words back to the top of the screen, these upgrades give you the edge you need in battle. Additionally, passive upgrades such as increased damage or extended power-up duration will make each fight more manageable.

Key Features:

Action-packed typing gameplay – Destroy enemies by typing words before they reach you.
Unique power-ups – Freeze, Push, and more to help you survive the word onslaught.
Passive upgrades – Strengthen your character with enhanced damage, power-up duration, and more.
Epic boss battles – Face off against challenging bosses with distinct abilities.
Strategic progression – Choose how to spend your resources wisely to maximize your chance of survival.
